r.d: This is the Querysim MDB2 driver.
r.n:
- use setCharset() in connect()/_doConnect() - generalized quoteIdentifier() with a property - switched most array_key_exists() calls to !empty() to improve readability and performance - fixed a few edge cases and potential warnings - added ability to rewrite queries for query(), exec() and prepare() using a debug handler callback
open todo items: - add ability to reference multiple results set files for different queries
